description: Occupying the ground floor of the historic Palazzo Prosdocimi in a delightful arcaded alleyway in Padova’s pedestrianised centre, this charming restaurant has a warm and romantic atmosphere thanks to its decor of paintings, mirrors and wood panelling, plus a beautiful ceiling with exposed wooden beams. The menu follows the changing seasons, offering a selection of delicious, classic dishes, with meat and – especially – fish (mostly from the Veneto) featuring on the menu.
